overview: In 1998 HotRod Joey Kemp entered the Lansdowne Demolition Derby and won first place. But his injuries were so severe that his doctors told him never to compete again.  "HotRod the Movie" is the real-life story of HotRod Joey Kemp's return to one of the world's most dangerous sports, Demolition Derby! Unfortunately, 8 other drivers want to take him down.
title: Hotrod: The Movie
